name: Peak Parkour (Beta 1.0)
description:
Have you ever wanted to parkour? I guess your dream has been achieved.

Peak Parkour is an indie game platformer made by Maanyare. The game is currently in development, so bugs and errors are expected and I am always willing to hear your feedback on how I can improve my game. P.S. The Score system, properly made assets, etc, are coming soon in the Beta Update 2.0.

Assets: All made by Maanyare

Controls: 

A - left

D - right

Space  - Jump

Esc - Pause/unPause

Credits: MZ_Dino (for testing), SumoMoosombo (name inspiration). The Dorrax no dewwit.

Leaderboard:

All-Time Leaderboard:

1. MaanYare:  36.16

2. MZ_Dino:  36.34

3. SumoMoosombo: 36.86

Patches: 

Beta 1.0 Changes:

- Fixed the slippery character movement.

+ Added checkpoint near the first gremlin. 

+ Increased jump force from 22.5 to 23.4. 

+ Added more space due to the map being "too cramped". 

+ Added Jump buffer/ Coyote time.

Next Up: Beta 2.0: Coming Soon: (It could take a while).
